headline: Teledyne (TDY): Assessing Valuation After Launch of Xtium3 PCIe Gen4 Industrial Imaging Series
summary: Teledyne Technologies is rolling out its new Xtium3 PCIe Gen4 frame grabber series, and the timing is interesting for anyone tracking the stock’s growth story in industrial imaging. See our latest analysis for Teledyne Technologies. The new frame grabber launch lands as Teledyne’s $503.96 share price works through a patch of softer short term sentiment, with a negative 90 day share price return. At the same time, a solid three year total shareholder return of 22.55 percent suggests longer...
